title: Welcome to the App
content: Thank you for installing our app! We hope you find it useful.

title: New Feature Alert
content: Check out our latest feature that allows you to customize your settings.

title: Maintenance Update
content: We will be performing maintenance on our servers tonight from 12 AM to 2 AM.

title: Feedback Request
content: We would love to hear your feedback on the app. Please take a moment to fill out our survey.

title: Security Notice
content: We have updated our security protocols to better protect your data.
